A song for my BLUVERINE(KATO/TIGER)&M.Ali(hare/tiger)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Filk Songs: A song for my BLUVERINE(KATO/TIGER)&M.Ali(hare/tiger)
By punisher on Wednesday, October 3, 2001 - 07:27 pm:

So here I am
doing everything I can
holding on to what I am
pretending I'm a IMA TRAINER
I'm trying to keep
the ground on my feet
it seems the world's
falling down around me
the weeks are all short
I'm singing this song
to trying to unlock monsters
more than maybe

and I'm so confused
about what to do
sometimes I want
to throw it all away

so here I am
looking older all the time
growing older all the time
feeling younger in my mind
I'm trying to sleep
I lost count of the sheep
my mind is racing faster
every minute
what could I do more
yeah I'm really not sure
I know I'm running circles
but I can't quit
and I'm so confused
about what to do
sometimes I want to
throw it all away
controlling everything in sight

I'm feeling weak
I don't feel right
you're telling me
I have to change
telling me to act my age
but if all that I can do
is just sit and watch time go
then I'll have to say good bye
life's too short to watch it fly
watch it fly!!!
(chat)you're gonna die
both of ya oh no
i deleted my save
and no one can save me
ahhhhh i must restart a new game
henger,worm,gali,mew others all gone ahhhhhSo here I am
doing everything I can
holding on to what I am
pretending I'm a IMA TRAINER
